Subjects: love, carnal, evils of; sermons, verse in
_description: The subversions effected by carnal love (4 lines), a tag in the Fasciculus morum

Bod187.Transcription:
Lawe hath no reȝthStrengþe hath no myȝhtWysdom ys
                    folye& holynesse ys trecherye

Bod410.Transcription:
þat law hath no ryght þat strenth hath no
                    myghtþat wysdom is folyeAnd holynes is trycherye

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
That lawe hath no riȝthþat strength hath no
                    rygthþat wysdome is folyeAnd holynes ys trichery

BodLauMis568.Transcription:
þat lawe haþ non ryghtþat strenkyth haþ no
                    myghtþat wysdom is folyAnd holinesse ys trechery

BodRawC670.Transcription:
That lawe hath noo ryȝteÞat [strength] hath no
                    myȝtÞat wysdom is folyAnd holynysse is trechery
BodRawC670.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 194.

OxfCCC218.Transcription:
That lawe hath noo ryȝtestrength hath no myȝtwysdom is
                    folyAnd holynesse is trechery
OxfCCC218.Note: Added to margin, marked for insertion.
OxfCCC218.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.525.

CamGon71.Transcription:
þat lawe ne hath no rythþat stienkyt hath no
                    mythþat wysdom is folyþat holynesse is trecchery

CamGon364.Transcription:
þat strenght hath no myȝghtþat wysdam is
                    folyþat holynesse is trecherie
CamGon364.Note:
Missing usual first line; three lines interspersed with Latin
                    prose.

CamStJohn159.Transcription:
Þat law has no ryghtÞat strenght hase no
                    myȝtÞat wydom [sic] is folyAnd halynes
                    trichery

Lincoln44.Transcription:
þat lawe haþe no ryȝthþat strenþe haþe
                    no myȝthþat wysdom is folyAnd holynes is trechery

Spalding.Transcription:
That lawe hase no ryghtStrength has no myghtthat wysdome is
                    folyAnd holynes trechory

WorcF19.Transcription:
þat lawe nas non ryȝtþat strenght hat non
                    myȝtþat wysdom ys no foleAn hele nisse trechere
